ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" SONY Super HAD CCD, color DSP, automatic CDS sensor
Horizontal Resolution: 420 TV Lines. Minimum Illumination: 0.0 LUX (IR on)
Build-in 20 infrared LEDs and 3.6mm wide view angle lens. NTSC system
Cable through bracket protects the camera from vandalism
Package including: 1 of security camera, 1 of 12V DC 500mA power supply, 1 of audio video power extension cable and 1 of security warning sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Built-in Sony Color CCD Infrared Audio Bullet Security Camera Outdoor Day Night Vision 20 IR Leds Build-in Microphone for DVR Surveillance System with Power Supply and Audio Video Power Cable WH1
